item.title: AWS Config Rules
item.description: Introduction Security is a part of the business, not against it. Auditing an environment is a daunting task no one ever wants to take up but in the era of Cloud Computing, everything is simple. In the article I will be explaining on how you can use AWS Config to audit your environment by creating custom rules and the important things to remember when creating them. Letâ€™s start auditing!
